name: Which Stall? (Horror Game)
description:
When you got to go, you got to go. But if you need to go, you should run.
Which Stall is an all new Horror Game, step into the shoes of a character who just needs to go to the toilet.
Your goal is to survive 9 days by correctly selecting which stall to use in a restroom known to have numerous murders. As the days go on, the restroom will become smaller and smaller with less stalls to choose from. However, behind one of the stall doors lies terror, you will die. As the game progresses the horror will get more intense with a greater chance of dying.

Will you survive?
